mapper.content:
{{4.mappable_column_values.single_select.text}} {{1.pulseName}} {{4.mappable_column_values.short_text8}}

Thank you for confirming your participation in our 2024 UnidosUS Annual Conference: Our Time is Now! We have received your form submission.

Moving forward, I will be your primary point of contact for the event. Please make note of my contact information, found in the signature of this email.

Next Steps & Reminders:

  • Please download the attached calendar invitation, adding this event to your calendar. We will send you a specific calendar invite for your session, adding 30-minutes to accommodate for call time.
  • Panel prep calls will be scheduled two-weeks before the event, in coordination with your administrative contact provided.
  • Make sure we have your updated day-of contact information, notify me immediately of any changes.

Stay tuned for more updates and details as the event approaches.

We appreciate your valuable contribution to our Conference. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me.

¡Es nuestro momento!

Best,

Gabriela Sazon | Administrative Manager | Communications & Marketing

202.776.1788 | gsazon@unidosus.org
unidosus.org | Facebook | Instagram | LinkedIn | Threads | X
mapper.subject: Lights, Las Vegas, Action! Your Response Received and Next Steps
